title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 187.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 187.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Commissioner
means the Commissioner of Agriculture and Markets of the State of New

York. (b) Department means the

Department of Agriculture and Markets. (c) Person means any individual, corporation, partnership, association or other organized group or persons, or any business
entity, by whatever name designated and whether or not incorporated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
187.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
